comment.text: This translation key is used for a button that instructs users to save their selection ("Save here") in a file management system, typically appearing as a submit or save button in a dialog or UI element. It's part of a broader set of translations related to file editing and saving, specifically in the context of a select folder dialog.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Burada yadda saxlayın" is a literal translation of "Save here" but doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. A more natural translation would be "Burada qeyd et" or "Burada saxlayın".

The Lao translation "ບັນທຶກ ນີ້" literally translates to "Record this". While understandable, it doesn't convey the nuance of "Save here". A more accurate translation would imply a destination for saving.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບັນທຶກໄວ້ທີ່ນີ້ (Banthik vai thi ni) - This means 'Save at/to here'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙතැන සුරකින්න' while understandable, is a more literal translation of 'Save here' implying 'Save at this place.' A more natural and commonly used translation for a button like this would be something conveying 'Save' or 'Keep'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමතීව (Kamaatheewa) or සුරකින්න (Surakkinna) are acceptable, but consider context. 'කාමතීව' is more direct, while 'සුරකින්න' is more general.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "在此保存" (Zài zhèlǐ bǎocún) is a technically correct translation, it sounds a bit formal and less natural for a button label like "Save here." A more user-friendly translation might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑使用更口语化的表达，例如 "保存到这里" (Bǎocún dào zhèlǐ) or "保存至此" (Bǎocún zhì cǐ).
